title: Jason Cammisa!
description:
Jason Cammisa probably knows more about cars than you, and he's happy to share that knowledge. He's written for all the big magazines, worked as a precision driver, and was a co-host on Motor Trend's Head-2-Head. He's currently publishing excellent video content on the ISSIMI Official YouTube channel, and co-hosting the Carmudgeon Podcast (available everywhere). Links below. He's a favorite guest, always full of good insights, and pulls no punches. 

Watch this podcast, Carmudgeon: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sArrduMDLBY

Watch ISSIMI: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCB10rh_nI_5FSC2PBM2OdmQ

 

Watch this show here! https://youtu.be/x6yWwfjsVKc
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
